patterns.agent_pattern: All agents inherit from BaseAgent class in agents/base_agent.py
patterns.config_pattern: Centralized configuration in config/config.py with Path objects
patterns.brand_context_loading: Load markdown files from claude-code-os-implementation/ directories
patterns.output_pattern: Save to output/ directory with timestamp-based filenames
patterns.api_client_pattern: Use anthropic.Anthropic client with API key from env

existing_implementations.description: Python content generation agents using Anthropic API with brand context loading

new_infrastructure_needs.api: FastAPI REST API to expose agents as web services
new_infrastructure_needs.testing: pytest with fixtures for agents, mock Anthropic API responses
new_infrastructure_needs.ci_cd: GitHub Actions for automated testing on push
new_infrastructure_needs.logging: Python logging module with structured logging to files and console
